sense.gloss: strict observance (of rules, regulations, etc.), strict adherence, conscientious practice (of good habits, etc.), diligent execution (e.g. of duties), sticking to (e.g. a routine)

words.gloss: strict observance (of rules, regulations, etc.), strict adherence, conscientious practice (of good habits, etc.), diligent execution (e.g. of duties), sticking to (e.g. a routine)
